comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: The Koreshan Unity Collection contains a number of playbills, programs, and other ephemera related to their theatrical performances. This photograph is the only record of the assumed anti-Chinese play "The Yellow Peril."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 61941044@N00
comment._content: The sepia/monotone somehow makes this photo even more creepy
